name: Animated Stove

action.name: Slam
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Belch Fire (Recharge 4-6)
text: The stove belches fire in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in the area must make a DC 10 Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 (4d10) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

description:
The stove was given a semblance of life through an animate objects spell made permanent by a wish spell.
Source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage p. 186
